title: Trump Social-Media SPAC Deal Being Investigated by SEC
sub_head: Inquiry comes after investors piled into the stock; in separate probe, electric-vehicle startup Lucid Motors says it got SEC subpoena
body:
The Securities and Exchange Commission is probing two of the most notable SPAC deals struck this year, including former President Donald Trumpâ€™s venture, signaling that regulators are ratcheting up scrutiny of such deals and rushing to keep up with the frenzy of activity.
The SEC is investigating a potential merger between Trump Media & Technology Group and the special-purpose acquisition company Digital World Acquisition Corp. , Digital World disclosed in a regulatory filing Monday. The SPAC, known by its stock ticker, DWAC, would inject cash into and take public a new social-media company Mr. Trump has planned.
